scripts.setup: npm i && husky install && npm --prefix ./client_web i && npm --prefix ./client_mobile i && npm --prefix ./server i && npm --prefix ./test i
scripts.start:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.publish:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t joffreychevalier/waitit-server && docker push joffreychevalier/waitit-server && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd client_web && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t joffreychevalier/waitit-client && docker push joffreychevalier/waitit-client && cd ..
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:server && npm run publish:client
